title.rendered: Thanks to all those that entered the video competition

content.rendered:
ALL winning teams have now been notified

There were more video entries this year than ever before, and the quality of all entries was at a very high standard. Whilst we were elated at the high standard of entries, this did mean the judging committee had a very difficult time in selecting those that could be invited to the National Finals. We were also sad that many really great entries could not be invited. For those of you who can attend a regional next year there will be 12, all in the month of November and throughout England, Scotland and Wales. We hope to see you there as a competitor, if not, please consider helping as a volunteer.

Thank you for your efforts.

From all of us at the Space Design Competition and Space Science Engineering Foundation we wish you the best of luck in your future endeavours – and if there is anything we can ever do to assist you, please feel free to contact us.

excerpt.rendered: ALL winning teams have now been notified
